_header: O prince of peace and king of grace
Subjects: Christ, prayers to; prayers, to Christ
_description: James Ryman, a prayer to the Prince of Peace — two stanzas rhyme royal

CULEe112.First Lines:
O prince of peas & king of graceO endeles lorde & moost of
                    myght…
CULEe112.Last Lines:
…Ayenst thy wille though we haue wroughtLese not that thou soo
                    dere hast bought
CULEe112.Editions:
Zupitza,  Julius,
                        ed.  
             “Die Gedichte des Franziskaners Jacob Ryman.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         89 (1892): 167-338: 267.
